title: Run hello world error on m1 mbp(macOS 12.0 (21A5506j))

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: O-Arm
labels.description: Target: 32-bit Arm processors (armv6, armv7, thumb...), including 64-bit Arm in AArch32 state

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-bisection
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs bisection: https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo-bisect-rustc

body:
### Code ```Rust fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0-nightly (aa8f2d432 2021-09-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: aa8f2d432b23575929a48f87b8746f41ba723318 commit-date: 2021-09-18 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.57.0-nightly LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` ❯ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build Compiling light v0.1.0 (/Users/lux/src/github.com/xunfeng1980/light) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "Provided allocation has wrong size for slot count 131072"', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:263:29 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt 2: core::result::unwrap_failed 3: rustc_metadata::rmeta::decoder::CrateMetadata::new 4: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 5: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::maybe_resolve_crate 6: rustc_metadata::creader::CrateLoader::process_extern_crate 7: ::visit_item 8: rustc_ast::visit::walk_item 9: ::visit_item 10: rustc_expand::expand::AstFragment::visit_with 11: rustc_resolve::macros::::visit_ast_fragment_with_placeholders 12: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::collect_invocations 13: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::fully_expand_fragment 14: rustc_expand::expand::MacroExpander::expand_crate 15: rustc_session::utils::::time 16: rustc_interface::passes::configure_and_expand 17: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::expansion 18: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 19: rustc_span::with_source_map 20: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.57.0-nightly (aa8f2d432 2021-09-18) running on aarch64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `light` ```
